definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: The drought and crop failure were the most serious in North China in a hundred years.
sentences.chinese: 那几年，华北平原发生了百年不遇的大旱灾和歉收。

sentences.english: Tuanbowa Reservoir is a saline-alkaline man-made lake in the North China plain.
sentences.chinese: 天津市团泊洼水库属华北平原滨海盐碱性水库。

sentences.english: My hometown lies on the Plain of North China.
sentences.chinese: 我的家乡位于华北平原。

sentences.english: In ancient times, there were many lakes on the North China Plain.
sentences.chinese: 历史时期，华北平原曾经有众多的湖泊。

definition: Northeast Plain, also called the Manchurian Plain
Taihang Mountains on the border between Hebei and Shanxi
Guanzhong plain in Shaanxi, valley of the Wei River 渭河
Sanjiang or Three rivers plain in Heilongjiang, vast wetland watered by Heilongjiang 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1] or Amur, Songhua 松花江[Song1 hua1 jiang1], Ussuri 烏蘇里江|乌苏里江[Wu1 su1 li3 jiang1]
Huai River, main river of east China, between the Yellow River 黃河|黄河[Huang2 He2] and the Changjiang 長江|长江[Chang2 Jiang1]
Northwest China (Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Ningxia, Xinjiang)
Songliao Plain of northeast China including Songhua River 松花江 through the Liaoning Peninsula, also called the Northeast Plain 東北平原|东北平原[Dong1 bei3 Ping2 yuan2]

pinyin: E4 er3 duo1 si1 Gao1 yuan2
